GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATE_MAGENTOHCQUANTITY ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @REVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
DECLARE @ADDEDBYID varchar(50) SET @ADDEDBYID = @changeagentid
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @REVENUESELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @REVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@REVENUESELECTIONID)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), REVENUEID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select ID from @REVENUESELECTION
declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @QTY integer declare @DONATION_REVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @MAGENTO_ORDERNUMBER integer
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @REVENUEID = REVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
select @QTY = quantity from usr_catalogrevenue where revenueid=@REVENUEID select @MAGENTO_ORDERNUMBER = value from attribute60539A2A97E14A1CBE12AFF32102D797 where revenueid=@REVENUEID select top 1 @DONATION_REVENUEID = id from financialtransaction where id in ( select revenueid from attribute60539A2A97E14A1CBE12AFF32102D797 where value=@MAGENTO_ORDERNUMBER and revenueid <> @REVENUEID ) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- begin begin try insert into attribute65F31982C82746CABED6134CA9521A2F (id, value, addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged) values (@DONATION_REVENUEID, @QTY, @ADDEDBYID, @ADDEDBYID, getdate(), getdate())
set @NUMBERADDED = @NUMBERADDED + @@rowcount; end try begin catch begin try update attribute65F31982C82746CABED6134CA9521A2F set value = @QTY where id = @DONATION_REVENUEID set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@rowcount; end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch end catch end set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
